00057     /*
00058      * Because menus are the only objects on the desktop owned
00059      * by the process and process cleanup is done after thread
00060      * cleanup, this may be the last reference to the desktop.
00061      * We must lock the desktop before unlocking
00062      * the parent desktop reference and freeing the menu to
00063      * ensure that the desktop will not be freed until after
00064      * the menu is freed.  Don't use static locks because
00065      * the pti for this thread will not be valid during
00066      * process cleanup.
00067      */
